A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Boring plot of a long slow space race.  Character development is predictable until a certain moment when they suddenly become something else for no reason other than a plot twist.  The ending leaves no reason to see a final chapter.  Of all Star Wars movies I will not buy this one.  Never interested in seeing again.  I would rather they tie this one off and end the franchise than continue this slow decline into failure.
